bill_title: permit the use of an online management and communication platform to be used by homeowners who are governed by a restrictive contract.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to permit the use of an online management and communication platform to be used by homeowners who are governed by a restrictive contract. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That a NEW SECTION be added to chapter 11-5: It is lawful for the owner of real property exercising the power conferred by § 11-5-1 to use an online management and communication platform for the purpose of voting online notwithstanding the provisions of chapters 47-22 and 47-23.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
